turns.content: Which companies are known for having the largest in house design teams

There are several companies known for having some of the largest in-house design teams. Here are a few examples:

1. Apple - Apple has a large in-house design team that is responsible for creating many of the company's products, including the iPhone, iPad, and Mac. The team is known for its focus on user experience and attention to detail.
2. Google - Google's design team, known as Google Design, is responsible for creating the look and feel of many of the company's products and services, including Google Search, Gmail, and Google Maps.
3. IBM - IBM has a large design team that is responsible for creating user interfaces, visual designs, and user experiences for the company's software products and services.
4. Airbnb - Airbnb has a large design team that is responsible for creating the visual design and user experience of the company's website and mobile app.
5. Uber - Uber has a large design team that is responsible for creating the user experience and visual design of the company's ride-sharing app and other products.

These companies have recognized the importance of design in their products and services, and have invested in building large in-house design teams to help drive their success.
